website_summaries.verdict: The one to choose for a complete set. This one comes with a complete faux leather couch and matching ottoman.
pros: A great combination of comfort, style, and arrangement possibilities
Matching ottoman is easy to clean and maintain just like the sofa
cons: Complete set can be difficult to fit and arrange in smaller spaces

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kid situations.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for under $500. Kid & Dogs. If it lasts two years I will be happy. Yes it is firm. I previously bought a poundex bobkona couch set before. So I expected this one to be firm and break in well. I assembled this myself with no help. I even manned up and didn't read the directions before I got to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: it look strong if you have pet you can buy this it cheap you throw away in couple year don't cost you a lot. this not enjoyable couch i can tell you that.
customer_reviews.author: Hanh C.

customer_reviews.title: Caution: VERY DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE.
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to assembling, this furniture is no where comparable to what you get in IKEA or NEBRASKA FURNITURE MART. A lot of misalignment and wrongly named/marked pieces( see the pic- per the assembly manual we are not supposed to see to pieces with same label) Quality is OK (we get what we paid for).
customer_reviews.author: Venu

customer_reviews.title: missing sectional connector
customer_reviews.text: I would score this a 5 but its missing item number 4 (2 pcs.sectional connector.) This is a really good sofa considering the price tag. Delivery was on the dot and package came intact. Assembly instruction was also missing, good thing it’s available online.
customer_reviews.author: AJA

customer_reviews.title: Truly exceeded my EXPECTATIONS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the sectional for over a month and we love it. We needed a new living room set but did not want to spend Raymour & Flanagan prices. The set actually exceeded our expectations. I expected a mini cheap looking sectional but was prepared to deal w/ it. The boxes were delivered while I was at work. The hubby put it all together w/ no issues. I got home and WOW!!!! This is not Queen Elizabeth quality so I don't wanna get your hopes up to high, but definitely competitive to Ashley Furniture etc....
customer_reviews.author: Rodnis

customer_reviews.title: impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't hard to put together however one of the bolts were not fitting and had to buy another. BUT I am totally satisfied with the comfort and stylish look of this sofa. i have fell asleep multiple times on it. i HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: bettahman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love my couch. It's big, but very comfortable and fits just right in my living room. I was afraid to buy it because the reviews were not really good, but there's no reason for that. I hired the assembly service and everything arrived on time and the crew assemble it in less than an hour. It's been 8 months and it still looks good and sturdy. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Ozawa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for ME.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed really worth it but it’s not. I found where all the pieces go but when I went to align them with the screws they don’t match up. It rips way too easy and just not having it align makes me want my money back. Shouldn’t be hard to put together but it is if the holes aren’t in the correct place.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Atalleh

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Just like anyone who is looking for a quality product for a very good price, I spent quite some time searching the internet for a sectional sofa and found one on craigslist. But, I'm a hunter for a better price, so I found the same one on amazon for less AND free delivery. I saved $120 on delivery and about $20 on the item price. Amazon.com is becoming a better place to buy a quality product at a better price for me. The color is dark brown, almost black, but because of the pink light on the wall it looks a bit differently. T
customer_reviews.author: Allina Lovett

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The hooks that came with it to attach the chaise to the couch were too small so we will have to go find larger ones, a missing bolt, some pieces fit odd, a lot of odd useless parts, some missing, have had couch for about 6 months and the underneath crashed in and broke. The couch coushions got squished all weird. Horrible horrible horrible! 0/10 would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Not great sofa but looks decent
customer_reviews.text: Assembling this sofa was a pain because of instruction manual is not very clear. I was not able to find any help in the manual on how to join the sofa for Right hand chaise. The packing was good but the delivery guy didnt deliver in the entry way. I had to carry it myself to second floor. But after all the pain, I am ok with the sofa as it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Don’t buy if you have children.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this couch April 2020 and absolutely loved the look and feel of the couch. By May 2020, the cross-bar between the cushions snapped when my average sized 16 year old daughter sat on it. We re-enforced it with a metal support. That did the trick until July 2020. Now the front wood of the couch is bowing between two of the cushions. We’ll need to figure a way to support it as well. Also, I can see the staples popping through the front of the frame. I’m really disappointed. I doubt the couch will last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Geiling

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: we love it so far, I gave it 4 stars because we had to drill a few holes
customer_reviews.author: dazzle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sofa for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm not giving this 5 stars was that I didn't receive all the hardware to assemble this, and I had no way to contact the seller to request that they send it. I'm still missing the bridge piece to hold the chaise to the sofa side. However, for $400 I'm not complaining too much. Great buy for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Austyn shuman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this couch in early 2019, not even a year later the seams are coming apart (see pics). Couch is extremely uncomfortable. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend with following reasons below: 1. so many components are missing such as Bolts and Nuts, and connection kits. HOW can I finish the assembly???? (This is very common review from other's comments. You should be aware of this) 2. many damages parts on the product. 3. looking very cheap cotton fabric. FYI, I went to HomeDepot by myself in order to get parts with extra cash. Thank you seller. I wasted my time and money :)
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s really good that can easily change to left or right chaise. Easy to assemble. Just had received damaged edge on one piece possibly it might got damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Tina V

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this couch for 6 months and the seat cushion is already sagging. It is unfortunate because it is a beautiful couch and perfect for an apartment but it is not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Niloo M Soleimani

customer_reviews.title: Cushion under ottoman is your workout for the day.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sectional!! Super easy to put together. Only challenge was removing the very packed in cushion under the ottoman, rest was a breeze. Color and style nicer than I anticipated. 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Temporary couch
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can chose to have it on the left or right side . The ottoman doesn’t open . The couch separates from one side where I have to keep putting it together again , and cushions fall off easily
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright .
customer_reviews.text: Some of my pieces didn’t fit together . And I think I was missing a few hardwares . Luckily , I was putting the couch up against the wall & could Lay that back piece up against it . It jus does a lil lean .. material is real easy to rip too when assembling & pieces don’t fit together so be careful . Lucky I can hide mine . Looks good tho , shiny , cushions are okay , I like the leaning seat the best cuz I can get comfortable 😂🤷🏽‍♀️(It’s on the chaise part)
customer_reviews.author: Ana Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of sofa
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of sofa. They came in good packaging and on time. It seemed pretty easy for my husband to assemble the set. We enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t look cheap at all
customer_reviews.text: There’s absolutely nothing I dislike. This is a gorgeous couch. The leather is nice, it’s comfortable. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. My only real complaint is that the cushions on the chaise side don’t stay put too well. I added a few Velcro strips and that seems to be doing the trick for the time being. We have 4 young children and it’s a good size for us. We had a much larger sectional that we moved into our movie room but this one seems to be getting more use and is holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUCK FOR YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought it was gonna be super small and cheap but honestly the quality is pretty good! Was not that hard to assemble, took me like an hour and feels comfortable! Better if you add like a blanket and extra pillows but love it would recommend, I didn’t receive anything damaged so honestly it just depends on who’s handling and delivering your package!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Luna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is really comfortable and easy to assemble. I really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bharti

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Nice sofa set for the price but one of the backs felt off and is so cheap made that my husband has had to fix it maybe three times
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly hard
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble, instructions need to be better and parts were not labeled. Overall love this set
customer_reviews.author: debby Pedigo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Comfortable Sofa
customer_reviews.text: Sofa has a Perfect look and quality product. Received the same as expected. Fully Comfortable and affordable product. Loved it!! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Suchitra Nimje

customer_reviews.title: Rip
customer_reviews.text: It’s what we expected. It wasn’t bad however, when we received it and started putting it together the last item was the ottoman. The ottoman is ripped right down the side of it. Not very happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Happy experience
customer_reviews.text: This sofa is really good. Feels like a expensive one and my whole family can sit all together and enjoy movie. :) I am pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: chhavi

customer_reviews.title: Love this sectional!
customer_reviews.text: This couch is way more than expected for the price!! It is super cute and very sturdy. Assembly was easy. I had to add velcro to the chaise to keep the cushion in place. And there was some damage done (probably during shipping) but nothing thats noticable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble looks good not the most comfortable couch but worth the price. If I had to buy it all over again I would
customer_reviews.author: Storm Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We have had the couch for about 5 months and still Love it! Holding up well with kids & pets!
customer_reviews.author: Dad of teens

customer_reviews.title: poundex bobkona matthew linen sectional
customer_reviews.text: it was okay but I gave it to my daughter to small for me
customer_reviews.author: C. eison

customer_reviews.title: Package received with a damage
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this sectional but it came damaged. One leg completely broken. This is a warehouse discounted product and no replacement available So, sadly had to return it. I wish I had one undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Naveen Sanaka

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces/ false advertisemnet
customer_reviews.text: I did not get the bottom pieces to the ottoman for it to stand up on off told the floor. It didn't come in the box with the ottoman, sofa or chase. Also, when I purchased this set it had a picture of the ottoman being able to open and put things inside. This ottoman does not open and I'm not happy about that at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Drill holes not lined up
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 star but the drill holes didn’t line up on one of the back pieces so it isnt bolted on both sides. The other back pieces were fine. Love it otherwise and will update the rating based on customer service response.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. Only owned for a couple of months and the frame is already broken in two places. Immensely overpriced for value, do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful couch
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch I bought it a couple years ago and it was stolen from me so I decided because I love it so much to just buy another one just like it! Gita my family of 3 no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Vantino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family of 4
customer_reviews.text: Great product for such a cheap price! We love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, ripped off within months
customer_reviews.text: It ripped off within few months and no phone number to reach the company. Amazon gave me email, I emailed them but they never respond. Dont ever buy this product as no one to help u if u run into problem
customer_reviews.author: Bilikis

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Couch is nice! Only issue was it was damaged during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Loved the couch
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice kinda hard for me to put together but I was great the first week now the seat coushions are worn. And I’ve only sat on my couch a few time
customer_reviews.author: Mileyyy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The sofa pieces dont fit together as pictured. We basically had to make it work. The hassle of a refund or a different one being sent was just too much
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Please be aware that all the preset drill holes do not line up
customer_reviews.text: I like the couch it's very nice but assembly was not easy had to drill my own holes to get the couch to a proper assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome couch for price , took a while to put together (2 hrs)
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Seams split open
customer_reviews.text: Seams in cushion split within one year. I have two holes where stuffing is coming out:(. Not overly comfortable either.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the cusions slide off all the time. Super annoying!
customer_reviews.text: When you sit down , the cushions always slide off and fall on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Missing Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I just got the product set up and everything and i really like it but I realized that the ottoman was not included in the boxes shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble I'm very shock and please with the quality beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Lynetta Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and we love it!!
customer_reviews.author: mercides cornelious

customer_reviews.title: blown away for $408
customer_reviews.text: This couch may need Velcro on some bottom cushions but absolutely worth the money. Very happy. No instructions
customer_reviews.author: crystal siamos

product_meta.title: Poundex Bobkona Matthew Faux Leather Left or Right Hand Chaise SECTIONAL Set with Ottoman in Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:EspressoBuilt for function and style, this sleekly designed 3-piece sectional features units upholstered in rich hued faux leather and accent tufting with light stitching. If you like ultra contemporary décor, indulge with a sectional that suits your desires. It also includes a matching cocktail ottoman. Available in Espresso or beige Dimensions : Chaise: 75" x 34" x 35"H Sofa: 70" x 34" x 35"H Ottoman: 35" x 24" x 19"H
feature_bullets: Seat Cushion Filled with foam and inner Spring for durability and comfort
U.S. Patented reversible design allowing this sectional to be Set up Chaise on the left or right configuration
Easy assembly and tools are all included. Dimensions : Chaise: 75" x 34" x 35"H Sofa: 70" x 34" x 35"H Ottoman: 35" x 24" x 19"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars118 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
